title: Introduction to Web Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create interactive websites from scratch.

title: Advanced React.js
description: Master React with hooks, context API, and advanced development patterns for modern applications.

title: UX/UI Design for Beginners
description: Learn to create attractive user interfaces and effective user experiences with modern tools.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Master Python and its main libraries for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

title: Astro 5: Build Modern Websites with the Component-First Approach
description: Learn the fundamentals and advanced features of Astro 5 to build fast, content-focused websites using its innovative component-first architecture.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Get started with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and learn about its core services for computing, storage, and networking.

title: Next.js 14: From Fundamentals to Advanced
description: Master Next.js 14, including the App Router, server components, data fetching, and advanced techniques for building modern, performant React applications.

title: Advanced Web Development: Full-Stack Mastery
description: Dive deep into advanced web development, mastering modern full-stack techniques with Node.js, React, GraphQL, and database technologies. Build scalable, high-performance web applications and APIs.
